body.name: SUNKTA Smart Watch for Men(Answer/Make Calls),1.96'' HD Touchscreen,5ATM Waterproof Tactical Smartwatch with Heart Rate Monitor/Blood Pressure/Blood Oxygen,400mAh Fitness Watch for Android iOS Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 6 hrs 18 mins
features: ➤【Military-Grade Inspection & 5ATM Waterproof】Special composite materials and metal casing allow our men's smartwatch to pass ten standard tests, including shock test, low-temperature test, vibration test, rain test, salt spray test, fungus test, liquid contamination test, sand and dust test, solar radiation test, etc. This fitness watch can undoubtedly become your reliable companion if you enjoy outdoor activities.

➤【Bluetooth Voice Calling & Message Notifications】The men's smartwatch supports answering, rejecting, and making calls directly on the smartwatch via Bluetooth. Our high-quality speakers and microphones ensure excellent sound quality and clear calls. The Smart Notifications feature synchronously alerts you to new messages from phone SMS, WhatsApp, Twitter, Facebook, Gmail, and more, ensuring you won't miss any important messages.You can also use the AI voice assistant and play music.

➤【24Hour Health Tracking】This smartwatch supports 24hour heart rate monitoring,as well as real-time detection of blood pressure and blood oxygen levels.Additionally,the watch provides sleep monitoring,recording the duration of your sleep and identifying your sleep stages(deep sleep,light sleep).It also features sedentary reminders and hydration reminders.The monitoring data can be stored for up to 30 days to help you better understand your physical condition and establish a healthy daily routine

➤【1.96'' Full Touchscreen & 400mAh Large Capacity Battery】Durable Smart watch with a 1.96‘’ large screen, adjustable brightness, and high resolution of 320*386. In the "FitCloudPro" application, our Bluetooth call smartwatch offers more than 200 different watch faces for you to choose from, and you can also customize your favorite images. With a 400mAh battery, it provides extra-long battery life, allowing you to wear it without worries and no longer fear a low battery.

➤【100 Sport Modes】The fitness tracker for men comes with 100 training programs. Whether you're running, cycling, climbing, surfing, rowing, playing soccer, golf, or tennis, it accurately records all your movements, tracks your workout time, health metrics, steps, distance, calories burned, and more. This sports smartwatch is absolutely perfect for your outdoor activities and adventures.

➤【Compatibility & Customer Service】This fitness smartwatch is compatible with smartphones running Android 5.0+ and iOS 9.0+. SUNKTA WATCH offers a 180-day no-questions-asked money-back guarantee and a 12-month free invoice guarantee to provide you with a better shopping experience. Our customer service is available 24/7, so feel free to contact us with any concerns or product issues. Note: The data provided by the smartwatch is for reference purposes only and is not intended as medical data.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SUNKTA Military Smart Watch for Men This military-grade smartwatch is made of high-strength metal and has passed numerous outdoor tests to ensure its water and shock resistance. The screen brightness is adjustable, making it easy to read the time and other functions under different lighting conditions. Built-in lossless audio and microphone enable one-touch Bluetooth calls, smart message notifications, and music playback.The smartwatch features a large 1.96'' HD screen with a resolution of up to 320*386 pixels.With a 400mAh battery, the smartwatch can be used for 7-10 days after just 2 hours of charging and can last up to 30 days in standby mode.Health Management Assistant: Sleep monitoring, 24-hour heart rate monitoring, real-time blood pressure/blood oxygen monitoring, and breathing exercises.With 100 training modes, you can measure workout time, distance, heart rate, and calorie consumption, making this smartwatch perfect for sports enthusiasts.2 Watch Straps: Black steel with black silicone///black silicone with black silicone.

Bluetooth Calling & Message Notifications This smart men's watch features a high-quality speaker and noise-cancelling microphone, providing the capability to make calls directly from the watch, enjoy music, and utilize the AI voice assistant, among other functions. It can also receive notifications for SMS, emails, and social media. This allows you to stay connected online at all times and not miss out on any important or engaging messages! Bluetooth Call Function: Dial, answer, end callsStore 10 frequently contacted numbers for one-click callsBrowse call historyDial composition Message Notification Function: Smart synchronization of message notifications from the phone with adjustable vibration alerts (vibration strength can be adjusted)Support for applications: Text messages, emails, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, SMS, WhatsApp, emails, WeChat, etc.

100 Sport Modes Integrated with over 100 different training modes to meet your diverse sporting needs. The smartwatch intelligently records your workout time, distance covered, step count, calories burned, and more. The data syncs with your phone, making it easier for you to analyze the results of your physical activities and plan a more scientific sports lifestyle. *Running, climbing, cycling, hiking, skiing, basketball, volleyball, soccer, jump rope, golf, long jump, fitness, yoga, and many other sports modes.

Multifunctional Men's Smart Watch This men's smartwatch comes with several integrated features and will be a great companion in daily life. Real-time blood pressure/blood oxygen data24-hour heart rate monitoring/sleep monitoringWeather forecastAI voice assistantStep counterMusic playerBreathing exercises/saturation reminder/water drinking reminderStopwatch/timerAlarm clock/calculatorPasscode lockFind phone / Find smartwatch

1.96'' HD Touchscreen & 2 Straps This exquisite smart men's watch features a 1.96'' high-definition touchscreen with 320*386 pixels, providing an incredibly vivid and clear display. It comes with several built-in classic watch faces for quick customization, and the "FitCloudPro" app offers a selection of over 200 online beautiful UI options.It includes two straps: the stainless steel strap embodies a classic and fashionable masculine style, suitable for various work and daily life occasions; the silicone strap is made of skin-friendly waterproof material, perfect for casual and sporting moments. You can switch between them according to your preference.The package includes an integrated stainless steel strap adjuster, allowing you to customize the length based on your wrist size. If the length is insufficient, you can ASK us, and we will send you a stainless steel strap extension package.

Bluetooth connection steps Q:How do I connect a smartwatch? Search "FitCloudPro" in Google Play Store or App Store or scan the QR code to download it.Open the "FitCloudPro" app and click the "+ Connect Device" button on the "Devices" screen.Tap "K-57" to connect. Q:How do I play media audio on my watch? Establish a Bluetooth connection between your smartwatch and your phone.Slide the watch down and tap the call icon to open "Media Audio". Q: Can I only use the "FitCloudPro" app? Is this app compatible with German?A: Yes, you must use the "FitCloudPro" app, which is compatible with English, Spanish, French, German and more than 20 other languages.Q:Why can't the watch receive push messages? make sure the push messages are enabled in the APP（FitCloudPro). Make sure notifications are displayed on your phone to receive push messages for the watch.If APP notifications are disabled on the phone, the smartwatch will not receive any notifications. *If you have any questions, please ASK us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight durable and accurate.
reviews.reviewText: This watch does all I expect and more. Especially for the price. Does the same as watches that cost hundreds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Inaccurate bp and heartrate readings
reviews.reviewText: Revised 12/4/23After this review was posted my watch was no longer bound to the app. It was connected to bluetooth but failed to sync. All of a sudden i had to agree to the "terms of service" which I already had. All of my current information in my phone was lost and my settings were reset to factory settings.Now my watch won't automatically bind to to app. VERY DISAPPOINTING. if i can't solve this problem im sending it back.I do really like this watch. It has a lot of features i use. Love the ability to take calls and talk using the watch. No one has complained about voice quality. My basic texts come through well, and allow me to read and delete (on the watch, not phone). You have the abilty to remove permissions for other apps. good weather info.I haven't found ANY fit style watch to be accurate. But it gives me as information as good as the big boys for a whole lot less.I work in environments that have taken its toll on the faces/ screens of many watches. This one has lived with me 24/7 for almost a month with no damage.Lots of watch faces and it appears you can buy a lot more.Some are very difficult to see all the information that is displayed, but I'm sure you'll find one that works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My fiancee has been asking about one for awhile found this and she loves it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The only good thing about this watch are the looks and the battery life. Other than that, it's junk. The step count was consistently 300 to 400 more than my phone. If I trusted the blood oxygen level I should be dead. Never went above 78. Once the app disconnected I couldn't get back in. Kept getting network errors. Even tried to re-register with a different email and still no luck. Don't waste your money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This smart watch is solid and well madeI'll follow up after one month.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Gifting!
reviews.reviewText: Loved the sleek style, the function and durability!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for price
reviews.reviewText: Not a bad watch for the price. You can connect your phones audio to the watch speaker. Not 100% on how accurate the fitness counters are. BP isn't accurate. Pulse and O² were close to my medical gear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable and practical.
reviews.reviewText: This watch does exactly what I bought it for. All Photos are after a week of use. Battery life runs at 10% per day so it can run 10 days before you need to recharge. I did not go easy on the watch. I’m a nail technician and needed something resistant, digital and affordable I could use and not feel bad if I got foot product and service residue on it. The screen scratched pretty easily after a week but still looks good unless it’s put directly under the light. The watch fits perfectly and true to photos and products details. I love all the screen options it comes with. App was easy to use and was easy to pair with my iPhone. This watch was better than I expected. It does exactly what I bought it for.

reviews.reviewTitle: Beautiful Smart Watch with HD AMOLED Screen!
reviews.reviewText: This is beautiful looking smart watch.The watch appears to be very rugged and well made, and it fits very well on my wrist. What really impresses me is the 1.43” AMOLED HD screen, with its 466*466 super high definition resolution...most watches around this price point include screens that are like 240 x 240 or low resolutions like that...this watch seriously shines with its very attractive screen!I find the touch screen works very well and intuitively when I am moving my fingers over it to use different functions as well.The watch supports many features including answering and dialing phone calls), and it has so many Fitness Watch features including 100+ Sports Modes, and Heart Rate and Sleep Monitoring. And works with Android and Apple iOS.Very impressed with this well made watch, and 5 stars!

This watch is a really good deal for the money. It's a very nice looking watch that is both stylish and functional in so many ways. The band is very adjustable so that you get a proper fit which is essential to get accurate readings for Oxygen saturation, heart rate and pulse. Long battery life, and charger connects magnetically. Software was easy to download/install and paired easily to android phone.There are a number of skins or themes for the watch so lots to choose from to suit your taste. So many sports modes which is great for accurate readings based on the activity type. Receiving and making calls was ok, but honestly can't find a reason why I'd want to do that through my watch. Notifications for social media and messenger. Keeps track of steps fairly accurately.The sleep monitor is also great. If you are having sleep difficulties it's a great tool to be able to track how much sleep you get, how much is deep sleep and how much is light sleep, and when they occurred, plus all the wake times and how long you were awake each time. It's not a replacement for decision making for a cpap machine, that really requires a proper sleep study. But as an ongoing tracker for your sleep habits, it can be very useful in determining whether you are sleeping well or combining that info with other factors to determine what might be causing sleep disruptions.My husband really likes the look of the watch and finds it very comfortable to wear. It's reasonably priced for all the features you get. Definitely makes a nice gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Beautiful smart watch with good battery life
reviews.reviewText: Excellent Smart watch with loads of features. I bought this smartwatch after doing lot of research on smartwatches. Did a lot of searching on a budget and finally settled on this one. So far it's really good, it has everything I need and feels comfortable to wear daily. Decent battery life too. For the price this is definitely well worth it.Would highly recommend this watch to anyone who is looking for a smart watch for decent price range.

I've held off on getting a smart watch for a while, but this one seemed to hit all the right notes for me: fitness/ sleep/ stress monitoring, waterproof and impact durable. I thought it sounded neat... almost a little too good to be true.The watch delivers which should be all that surprising given the ~90$ price tag. If you really want a smartwatch, fork out the cash and get a good one. As a veteran I get a kick out of 'military-grade' gear, but this watch is a brick, good and tough. Not sure how well it will hold up in the long run but so far it seems to be doing well under a fair bit of abuse.
